column5: I need to pump out the oil through the dipstick on the I/O, as the drain plug on the pan is a pain in the    to get at. i have seen the pumps that run off of 12 volt to do this with, but I have no idea where to pick one up. Anyone got any idea where they can be purchased from, and what they are worth?   Thanks  Don
Grab a wolf drill powered pump at CTC they work quite well. I used one to transfer + 200 liters of fuel oil from an old tank to my new tank.
thought about one of those - but do they take a hose small enough to fit down the dipstick tube?  Don
